name: Wasted Pizza
description: Wasted Pizza is an Online Multiplayer shooter game where you will be playing as an untouched pizza in a room full of all the other pizzas but be aware you aren't the only untouched pizza out there. Your mission is hiding amongst the other pizzas, spot and shoot tomatos on the other untouched pizzas.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
